Responsibilities

 About TikTok: 
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

About Video Creation Team: 
Our team's mission is to empower TikTok users to turn creativity into reality via videos. We build the core video creation product to support tens of millions of TikTok creators every day. All the viral props and effects you find on TikTok are developed by us, via close collaboration with TikTok AR effects and multimedia teams. Our goal is to build the world's best video creation software. On this team, you will be working with our XFN partners to define a world-class video creation experience, designing the architecture of TikTok video creation tools and pipelines, and shipping cutting-edge features to take TikTok to the next level.

Responsibilities
- Collaborate with product/design and other engineering teams to define a world-class video creation experience.
- Design and implement user-facing features of TikTok video creation software using the latest technology.
- Build reusable software components with robust code and clear documentation, and deliver high quality work.
- Analyze and optimize iOS applications for quality, efficiency, and performance.
- Research, analyse and evaluate requirements for existing or new web and mobile applications. 
- Design, develop, test and maintain web and mobile solutions to meet the requirements. 
- Evaluate programming codes to ensure that they are properly structured, meet industry standards and are compatible with browsers and devices. 
- Develop website infrastructure and integrate websites with other computer applications. 

Qualifications

 1. BS/MS degree in Computer Science or equivalent majors with 2+ years of iOS development experience. 
2. Proficient in Objective-C or Swift, strong understanding of software development principles, capabilities, and limitations of iOS platform.
3. Solid knowledge of multi-threading, data structure, operating system and network.
4. Ability to understand and debug large and complex code bases.
5. Experience in audio & video multimedia client development is preferred.
6. An effective communicator with excellent collaborative skills, strong self motivation and great problem solving skills.
7. Promote robust and maintainable code, clear documentation, and deliver high quality work on a tight schedule.
8. Willing to take up challenges and grow in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Experience of working in a cross-regional team is a plus.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

About Us
We are growing our Robotics team at Dyson to deliver an expanding range of innovative, intelligent and connected Robotic Products. If you are passionate about delivering the best product for customers, enabling teams to excel and developing individuals to perform at their best and achieve their career goals, then we would love to hear from you.

Design and develop embedded software for production consumer products on a range of silicon platforms, mainly ARM based MCU/MPUManage the entire life cycle of multiple related complex modules and systems, including requirement alignment, software design, coding, testing, documentation, release, maintenance and result tracking, manufacturing test/verification methodologyInvolve in continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) infrastructure/environment setupKeen focus on product performance and test automation efficiency. In-depth participation in cross-teams product design discussions will be required. 
About you

A bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or similar.8+ years of work experience in embedded system development.Good command of C/C++ programming language is essential.Good knowledge of MCU/MPU architecture and its common peripherals such as WiFi, BLE, NFC, ZigBee and camera.Excellent knowledge of Operating Systems such as Linux and RTOSExperience in board bring up, Linux BSP and RTOS integration is essential.Experience with debug tool like GDB, Linux driver development and testing experience is highly desired.Experience in automated testing and manufacturing test process is highly desired.Excellent object-oriented programming (OOP) capability, including speed and overall quality; preferably, the candidate shall be able to write high performance product quality code with both C and modern C++.Familiar with STL, boost C++ libraries, design patterns and able to enforce it in day-to-day tasks is a plus.Strong proficiency in multithreading programming and synchronisation mechanisms.Proficient in scripting languages, such as Python and Bash.Experience in fulfilling continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipeline setup.Experience of safety software development (MISRA, IEC standards, etc) is advantage. Benefits

Dyson Singapore monitors the market to ensure competitive salaries and bonuses. Beyond that, you’ll enjoy a transport allowance and comprehensive medical care and insurance. But financial benefits are just the start of a Dyson career. Professional growth, leadership development and new opportunities abound, driven by regular reviews and dynamic workshops. And with a vibrant culture, the latest devices and a relaxed dress code reflecting our engineering spirit, it’s an exciting team environment geared to fuelling and realising ambition.

Job description:
Job Responsibilities
Utilize Azure technology to conceptualize, construct, and adapt business-tier components, REST APIs, web applications, and database elements. Construct prototypes to validate proposed concepts and gather input from stakeholders. Demonstrate strong proficiency in test-driven development and continuous integration processes. Engage in analysis and design, translating high-level design into detailed plans and implementing them. Work closely with Team Leads to define and clarify business requirements, estimate development costs, and finalize project timelines.Execute unit and integration tests for all developed code, implementing these tests throughout the development process. Proactively evaluate application code for performance and scalability, addressing concerns as they arise. Collaborate with the Quality Assurance Team to manage issue reporting, resolution, and change control. Provide support and troubleshooting assistance to the Operations Team when environmental issues arise during application deployment across various environments. Assist other teams in resolving issues stemming from applications or the integration of multiple components.

Possess a minimum of 5 years of relevant work experience and expertise in Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure IaaS & PaaS, and microservices. Proficient in Java, JavaScript, Python, and familiarity with GoLang is a plus. Comprehend design principles and architectural fundamentals. Capable of translating functional and nonfunctional requirements into system specifications. Proficient in developing and coding complex Azure cloud-native applications and integrating them with automated CI/CD pipelines, particularly GitLab. Able to create unit test cases and scenarios based on specifications. Stay updated on current technology and industry trends.

Responsibilities
 Design and develop high-performance, high-concurrency market-making strategy systems to ensure excellent response times even during active trading periods. Optimize the performance of the trading system to prevent delays and errors under high loads, ensuring uninterrupted and smooth execution of strategies. Take responsibility for system deployment tasks to ensure the successful launch and operation of market-making strategy systems. Conduct system monitoring and fault handling, quickly identify and resolve technical issues to ensure system continuity and stability.
Requirements
 At least 3 years of experience in high-concurrency software development using Golang/C++/JAVA/RUST, with preference given to those with experience in low-latency market-making strategy development. Ability to independently develop strategies and practical experience with grid strategies and cross-market strategies. Familiarity with CEX and DEX arbitrage strategies. Proficiency in the Linux operating system, computer networks, and solid foundational knowledge. Familiarity with distributed architecture and multi-threaded processing, capable of ensuring stable system operation under high-concurrency conditions using appropriate technical methods. Proficiency in database operations and optimization, capable of designing and maintaining high-performance data storage solutions. Knowledge of front-end development, familiarity with Javascript, CSS, HTML, and understanding of common front-end frameworks, including but not limited to Bootstrap and JQuery. Good communication capabilities in both English and Mandarin.

Responsibilities
Design, implement, and maintain infrastructure as code (IaC) solutions using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation to automate the provisioning of cloud resources.Collaborate with software development teams to integrate GitOps practices, enabling continuous delivery and deployment of applications and infrastructure.Deploy, configure, and manage Kubernetes clusters and related technologies for container orchestration and microservices architectures.Ensure high availability, scalability, and performance of production systems by implementing and maintaining robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions.Collaborate with development teams to optimize application performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement efficient CI/CD pipelines.Implement and manage infrastructure and application security measures, including access controls, encryption, and vulnerability scanning.Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, QA engineers, and system administrators, to improve operational processes and promote a culture of automation and DevOps.Continuously evaluate and recommend cloud tools and technologies to enhance system reliability, scalability, and cost optimization.Conduct performance analysis, capacity planning, and system tuning to ensure optimal resource utilization and system efficiency.Participate in incident response and resolution activities, identifying root causes and implementing preventive measures.Document infrastructure configurations, deployment processes, and operational procedures to ensure knowledge sharing and maintain system documentation.
Requirements
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.Proven experience (5+ years) as a DevOps/SRE Engineer, with a focus on GitOps, Infrastructure as Code, and cloud-native tools.Strong knowledge and hands-on experience with GitOps practices, including Git, GitLab, or GitHub, for continuous delivery and deployment.Proficiency in infrastructure as code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation for automating infrastructure provisioning.Solid understanding of Kubernetes and containerization technologies, with experience deploying and managing Kubernetes clusters.Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP, and their services for infrastructure provisioning, management, and monitoring.Experience in setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or CircleCI.Knowledge of infrastructure and application security practices, including access controls, encryption, and vulnerability management.Strong scripting and automation skills using languages like Bash, Python, or PowerShell.Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or Splunk.Experience with Agile methodologies and familiarity with DevOps principles and practices. Relevant certifications, such as Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) or AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, are desirable.

Key Responsibilities
Act as subject matter expert on OSS Assurance Tools focusing on configuration, deployment, and day-to-day operations.Work with cross-functional teams (NOC, Network Operations, Service Delivery etc) to understand business requirements and translate them into effective configurations for the deployed systems / tools.Configure and customize the tools to meet needs of business, operation users.Work with internal team and vendors to integrate new features and enhancements into deployed tools, ensuring compatibility and seamless operation.Conduct thorough testing of the configurations and deployments to identify and resolve any issues or performance bottlenecks.Monitor and analyse the performance and effectiveness of the deployed tools, making recommendations for improvements and optimization.Work with ITSM & NOC teams to troubleshoot and resolve any issues or incidents related to the deployed OSS tools, ensuring minimal impact on operations.Collaborate with vendors and external partners to implement and maintain the system, including managing software updates and patches.Stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in OSS trends and recommend innovative solutions to enhance operational efficiency.
The profile we are looking for
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.5+ years of experience in Telecom OSS domain mainly in Service AssuranceProven experience working with telecom service assurance tools, specifically in configuration, deployment, and day-to-day operations.Familiarity with industry-standard fault management systems, such as IBM Tivoli Netcool, HP OpenView, Nokia NAC/AOR, CA Spectrum, or equivalent will be a plus.Strong technical skills in areas such as scripting, database management, and network protocols.Familiarity with Apache Nifi will be an advantage.Experience with OSS integration, including data mapping, data transformation, and API integration.Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, utilizing protocols like TCP/IP, ICMP, JMS, Kafka, syslog, or SNMP to diagnose and resolve complex issues.Solid understanding of telecommunications and network operations, including network monitoring, fault management, and performance management.Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to quickly analyse and resolve complex issues.

About CSIT
CSIT develops products to advance the national security interests of Singapore. We use our products in a wide range of use-cases, including but not limited to Counter-terrorism and Computer Network Defence.
Software product development is an involved process. Our product teams need to be well supported with an integrated platform and infrastructure that enable them to deliver software quickly and efficiently. We are looking for talented and experienced software engineers that are passionate about developer experience to lead, build, and expand this foundational platform that improves our developers’ productivity.
Role
As a senior software engineer in our dynamic platform team, you will play a key part in the development and maintenance of software toolchain, services, and automation on our cloud infrastructure to aid our engineers in software development. You will be an engineers’ engineer, collaborating closely with product teams to ensure an excellent software development experience.
Responsibilities
Design, build, and maintain features and automation for our developer platform, which includes a range of cloud services and APIs used by our developers to build and deploy exciting applicationsWork with engineers across our entire software development stack to improve software delivery performanceCollaborate with other platform and infra teams to ensure seamless integration between our developer platform and other services in our private cloudLead deep technical discussion with the team to solve complex problemsMaintain a high standard of code quality and ensure best practices are followedTake an engineer’s approach to operational work, developing software to optimise our platform and eliminating work through automation
Requirements (Minimum Qualifications)
Bachelor's degree in computer science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experienceAt least 5 years of experience in software development using one or more general purpose programming languages (e.g. Python, Java, Go)Experience working with containerization technologies such as Docker or KubernetesFamiliarity with API design principles, and experience building and maintaining APIsExcellent problem-solving and communication skills, with the ability to work independently or as part of a team
Nice-to-haves
At least one year of experience working on developer facing systems, cloud services, infrastructure automation or in a DevOps or Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) roleAt least one year of experience in a technical leadership roleExperience in the design and operation of large-scale distributed systems
As CSIT is an agency under the Ministry of Defence (Singapore), only Singapore Citizens will be considered.

Job description:
Job Description
Configuration & Release ManagementResponsible for building and setting up new development tools and infrastructure utilizing Knowledge in continuous integration, delivery, and deployment (CI/CD), Cloud technologies, Container Orchestration and Security. Build and test end-to-end CI/CD pipelines, ensuring that systems are safe against security threats.

Responsibilities

 About TikTok: 
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo. 

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible. 
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day. 
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always. 
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve. 
Join us.

About Video Creation Team: 
Our team's mission is to empower TikTok users to turn creativity into reality via videos. We build the core video creation product to support tens of millions of TikTok creators every day. All the viral props and effects you find on TikTok are developed by us, via close collaboration with TikTok AR effects and multimedia teams. Our goal is to build the world's best video creation software. On this team, you will be working with our XFN partners to define a world-class video creation experience, designing the architecture of TikTok video creation tools and pipelines, and shipping cutting-edge features to take TikTok to the next level.

Responsibilities
- Collaborate with product/design and other engineering teams to define a world-class video creation experience.
- Design and implement user-facing features of TikTok video creation software using the latest technology.
- Build reusable software components with robust code and clear documentation, and deliver high quality work.
- Analyze and optimize iOS applications for quality, efficiency, and performance.
- Research, analyse and evaluate requirements for existing or new web and mobile applications. 
- Design, develop, test and maintain web and mobile solutions to meet the requirements. 
- Evaluate programming codes to ensure that they are properly structured, meet industry standards and are compatible with browsers and devices. 
- Develop website infrastructure and integrate websites with other computer applications. 

Qualifications

 1. BS/MS degree in Computer Science or equivalent majors with 2+ years of iOS development experience. 
2. Proficient in Objective-C or Swift, strong understanding of software development principles, capabilities, and limitations of iOS platform.
3. Solid knowledge of multi-threading, data structure, operating system and network.
4. Ability to understand and debug large and complex code bases.
5. Experience in audio & video multimedia client development is preferred.
6. An effective communicator with excellent collaborative skills, strong self motivation and great problem solving skills.
7. Promote robust and maintainable code, clear documentation, and deliver high quality work on a tight schedule.
8. Willing to take up challenges and grow in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Experience of working in a cross-regional team is a plus.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
Skills: Computer Science:Industry standards:Mobile Applications:Mobile Solutions:Multithreading:Objective-C:Software Development:Swift (Programming Language):iOS:iOS Development

Job description:
About Us
We are growing our Robotics team at Dyson to deliver an expanding range of innovative, intelligent and connected Robotic Products. If you are passionate about delivering the best product for customers, enabling teams to excel and developing individuals to perform at their best and achieve their career goals, then we would love to hear from you.
About The Role
Design and develop embedded software for production consumer products on a range of silicon platforms, mainly ARM based MCU/MPUManage the entire life cycle of multiple related complex modules and systems, including requirement alignment, software design, coding, testing, documentation, release, maintenance and result tracking, manufacturing test/verification methodologyInvolve in continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) infrastructure/environment setupKeen focus on product performance and test automation efficiency. In-depth participation in cross-teams product design discussions will be required. 
About you

A bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or similar.8+ years of work experience in embedded system development.Good command of C/C++ programming language is essential.Good knowledge of MCU/MPU architecture and its common peripherals such as WiFi, BLE, NFC, ZigBee and camera.Excellent knowledge of Operating Systems such as Linux and RTOSExperience in board bring up, Linux BSP and RTOS integration is essential.Experience with debug tool like GDB, Linux driver development and testing experience is highly desired.Experience in automated testing and manufacturing test process is highly desired.Excellent object-oriented programming (OOP) capability, including speed and overall quality; preferably, the candidate shall be able to write high performance product quality code with both C and modern C++.Familiar with STL, boost C++ libraries, design patterns and able to enforce it in day-to-day tasks is a plus.Strong proficiency in multithreading programming and synchronisation mechanisms.Proficient in scripting languages, such as Python and Bash.Experience in fulfilling continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipeline setup.Experience of safety software development (MISRA, IEC standards, etc) is advantage. Experience of interfaces such as UART, I2C, SPI, MIPI.Experience in sensors modules integration and calibration is plus.Low level debugging experience, such as by JLink, Oscilloscope, etc. is a plus.Experience in Agile practices is a plus.Professionalism and excellent communication skills, ability to communicate complex information at every level.Fluent in spoken and written English 
Benefits

Dyson Singapore monitors the market to ensure competitive salaries and bonuses. Beyond that, you’ll enjoy a transport allowance and comprehensive medical care and insurance. But financial benefits are just the start of a Dyson career. Professional growth, leadership development and new opportunities abound, driven by regular reviews and dynamic workshops. And with a vibrant culture, the latest devices and a relaxed dress code reflecting our engineering spirit, it’s an exciting team environment geared to fuelling and realising ambition.
Dyson is an equal opportunity employer. We know that great minds don’t think alike, and it takes all kinds of minds to make our technology so unique. We welcome applications from all backgrounds and employment decisions are made without regard to race, colour, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other any other dimension of diversity.

Responsibilities
Design, implement, and manage Infrastructure as Code (IaC) solutions using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation to automate cloud resource provisioning.Collaborate with software development teams to integrate GitOps practices, enabling continuous delivery and deployment of both applications and infrastructure.Deploy, configure, and oversee Kubernetes clusters and related technologies for container orchestration and microservices architectures.Ensure the high availability, scalability, and performance of production systems through robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions.Collaborate with development teams to optimize application performance, troubleshoot issues, and establish efficient CI/CD pipelines.Implement and oversee infrastructure and application security measures, including access controls, encryption, and vulnerability scanning.Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, QA engineers, and system administrators, to enhance operational processes and foster an automation-centric DevOps culture.Continuously evaluate and recommend cloud-native tools and technologies to improve system reliability, scalability, and cost-effectiveness.Conduct performance analysis, capacity planning, and system tuning to ensure efficient resource utilization and system effectiveness.Participate in incident response and resolution activities, identifying root causes and implementing preventive measures.Document infrastructure configurations, deployment procedures, and operational guidelines to facilitate knowledge sharing and maintain comprehensive system documentation.
Requirements
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.Proven experience (5+ years) as a DevOps/SRE Engineer, with a focus on GitOps, Infrastructure as Code, and cloud-native tools.Strong knowledge and hands-on experience with GitOps practices, including Git, GitLab, or GitHub, for continuous delivery and deployment.Proficiency in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation for automating infrastructure provisioning.Solid understanding of Kubernetes and containerization technologies, including experience in deploying and managing Kubernetes clusters.Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP, and their native services for infrastructure provisioning, management, and monitoring.Experience in setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or CircleCI.Knowledge of infrastructure and application security practices, encompassing access controls, encryption, and vulnerability management.Strong scripting and automation skills using languages like Bash, Python, or PowerShell.Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or Splunk.Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with great attention to detail.Strong collaboration and communication skills for effective teamwork with cross-functional groups.Experience with Agile methodologies and a grasp of DevOps principles and practices.Desirable certifications such as Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) or AWS Certified DevOps Engineer.

Basic up to $6800 + AWS + VBMonday – Friday 8.30am – 6pm18 days ALComprehensive health and medical insurance coverage for confirmed staff.Location: Buona Vista

Provide support and troubleshooting assistance to the Operations Team when environmental issues arise during application deployment across various environments. Assist other teams in resolving issues stemming from applications or the integration of multiple components.

Possess a minimum of 5 years of relevant work experience and expertise in Cloud Platform, Microsoft Azure IaaS & PaaS, and microservices. Proficient in Java, JavaScript, Python, and familiarity with GoLang is a plus. Comprehend design principles and architectural fundamentals. Capable of translating functional and nonfunctional requirements into system specifications. Proficient in developing and coding complex Azure cloud-native applications and integrating them with automated CI/CD pipelines, particularly GitLab. Able to create unit test cases and scenarios based on specifications. Stay updated on current technology and industry trends.

Responsibilities
 Design and develop high-performance, high-concurrency market-making strategy systems to ensure excellent response times even during active trading periods. Optimize the performance of the trading system to prevent delays and errors under high loads, ensuring uninterrupted and smooth execution of strategies. Take responsibility for system deployment tasks to ensure the successful launch and operation of market-making strategy systems. Conduct system monitoring and fault handling, quickly identify and resolve technical issues to ensure system continuity and stability.
Requirements
 At least 3 years of experience in high-concurrency software development using Golang/C++/JAVA/RUST, with preference given to those with experience in low-latency market-making strategy development. Ability to independently develop strategies and practical experience with grid strategies and cross-market strategies. Familiarity with CEX and DEX arbitrage strategies. Proficiency in the Linux operating system, computer networks, and solid foundational knowledge. Familiarity with distributed architecture and multi-threaded processing, capable of ensuring stable system operation under high-concurrency conditions using appropriate technical methods. Proficiency in database operations and optimization, capable of designing and maintaining high-performance data storage solutions. Knowledge of front-end development, familiarity with Javascript, CSS, HTML, and understanding of common front-end frameworks, including but not limited to Bootstrap and JQuery. Good communication capabilities in both English and Mandarin.

Responsibilities
Design, implement, and maintain infrastructure as code (IaC) solutions using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation to automate the provisioning of cloud resources.Collaborate with software development teams to integrate GitOps practices, enabling continuous delivery and deployment of applications and infrastructure.Deploy, configure, and manage Kubernetes clusters and related technologies for container orchestration and microservices architectures.Ensure high availability, scalability, and performance of production systems by implementing and maintaining robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions.Collaborate with development teams to optimize application performance, troubleshoot issues, and implement efficient CI/CD pipelines.Implement and manage infrastructure and application security measures, including access controls, encryption, and vulnerability scanning.Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, QA engineers, and system administrators, to improve operational processes and promote a culture of automation and DevOps.Continuously evaluate and recommend cloud tools and technologies to enhance system reliability, scalability, and cost optimization.Conduct performance analysis, capacity planning, and system tuning to ensure optimal resource utilization and system efficiency.Participate in incident response and resolution activities, identifying root causes and implementing preventive measures.Document infrastructure configurations, deployment processes, and operational procedures to ensure knowledge sharing and maintain system documentation.
Requirements
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.Proven experience (5+ years) as a DevOps/SRE Engineer, with a focus on GitOps, Infrastructure as Code, and cloud-native tools.Strong knowledge and hands-on experience with GitOps practices, including Git, GitLab, or GitHub, for continuous delivery and deployment.Proficiency in infrastructure as code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation for automating infrastructure provisioning.Solid understanding of Kubernetes and containerization technologies, with experience deploying and managing Kubernetes clusters.Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP, and their services for infrastructure provisioning, management, and monitoring.Experience in setting up and managing CI/CD pipelines using tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or CircleCI.Knowledge of infrastructure and application security practices, including access controls, encryption, and vulnerability management.Strong scripting and automation skills using languages like Bash, Python, or PowerShell.Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or Splunk.Experience with Agile methodologies and familiarity with DevOps principles and practices. Relevant certifications, such as Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) or AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, are desirable.

Key Responsibilities
Act as subject matter expert on OSS Assurance Tools focusing on configuration, deployment, and day-to-day operations.Work with cross-functional teams (NOC, Network Operations, Service Delivery etc) to understand business requirements and translate them into effective configurations for the deployed systems / tools.Configure and customize the tools to meet needs of business, operation users.Work with internal team and vendors to integrate new features and enhancements into deployed tools, ensuring compatibility and seamless operation.Conduct thorough testing of the configurations and deployments to identify and resolve any issues or performance bottlenecks.Monitor and analyse the performance and effectiveness of the deployed tools, making recommendations for improvements and optimization.Work with ITSM & NOC teams to troubleshoot and resolve any issues or incidents related to the deployed OSS tools, ensuring minimal impact on operations.Collaborate with vendors and external partners to implement and maintain the system, including managing software updates and patches.Stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in OSS trends and recommend innovative solutions to enhance operational efficiency.
The profile we are looking for
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.5+ years of experience in Telecom OSS domain mainly in Service AssuranceProven experience working with telecom service assurance tools, specifically in configuration, deployment, and day-to-day operations.Familiarity with industry-standard fault management systems, such as IBM Tivoli Netcool, HP OpenView, Nokia NAC/AOR, CA Spectrum, or equivalent will be a plus.Strong technical skills in areas such as scripting, database management, and network protocols.Familiarity with Apache Nifi will be an advantage.Experience with OSS integration, including data mapping, data transformation, and API integration.Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, utilizing protocols like TCP/IP, ICMP, JMS, Kafka, syslog, or SNMP to diagnose and resolve complex issues.Solid understanding of telecommunications and network operations, including network monitoring, fault management, and performance management.Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to quickly analyse and resolve complex issues.

Here at Gcore, our mission is to make the Internet faster, more reliable, and more secure. We are currently seeking Systems Engineer to join our dynamic team of over 500+ professionals spanning 30+ locations worldwide!
We’re looking for a Systems Engineer, motivated and open-minded professionals who will join our journey to personal and company growth!
